chunks.zh: 不想失去猫猫怎么办？
chunks.en: What should I do if I don't want to lose my cat?

chunks.zh:
早上查了，猫猫毛过敏引起的哮喘。
医生建议猫咪送人。
chunks.en:
I checked this morning and found that asthma is caused by cat hair allergies.
The doctor suggested giving the cat away.

chunks.zh:
目前是可逆的，如果长此以往，哮喘就会变成不可逆。
还有就是打抗敏针，也不是根治的，一直养猫一直打，一月一次。
我对猫依赖度还好，主要是我老婆不愿意送人，目前我的想法是：回家尽量距离猫远一点，扫地机器人勤打扫，尽可能戴口罩，不让猫去卧室。
大家有什么建议吗？
chunks.en:
It is currently reversible, but if it continues, the asthma will become irreversible.
Another option is to get allergy shots, but it's not a cure. You have to keep getting them as long as you have the cat, once a month.
I'm not that attached to the cat, but my wife doesn't want to give it away. My current plan is to stay away from the cat as much as possible at home, use the robot vacuum cleaner frequently, wear a mask as much as possible, and keep the cat out of the bedroom.
Any suggestions?

chunks.zh: 你老婆宁愿让你受罪也要留着猫？建议换个老婆
chunks.en: Your wife would rather see you suffer than get rid of the cat? I suggest getting a new wife.

chunks.zh: 人比猫重要。
chunks.en: People are more important than cats.

chunks.zh: 医生都查明猫是过敏源了，有啥好留恋的。
chunks.en: The doctor has already confirmed that the cat is the allergen, what's there to miss?

chunks.zh: 你老婆不肯送，让她和猫一起去过日子吧。
chunks.en: If your wife refuses to give it away, let her live with the cat.

chunks.zh: 不养猫最好，你不可能在家一直戴口罩，一直待在卧室。
chunks.en: It's best not to have a cat. You can't wear a mask all the time at home, or stay in the bedroom all the time.

chunks.zh: 你老婆是根本不关心你身体的是吗？
chunks.en: Doesn't your wife care about your health at all?

chunks.zh: 在她看来你身体健不健康还没有一只猫来得重要是吗？
chunks.en: In her opinion, is your health less important than a cat?

chunks.zh: 这么说吧，换成你老婆哮喘，你不愿意把猫送走，你老婆把这件事往小红书一发，你就可以准备退网了。
chunks.en: Let's put it this way, if your wife had asthma and you weren't willing to give the cat away, and your wife posted this on Xiaohongshu, you could prepare to disappear from the internet.

chunks.zh: 现在有好多办法，一是有抑制过敏原的猫粮，二是可以人打脱敏针，三是可以想办法和哮喘共存不是移除了猫就万事大吉的，即便你移除了猫，同事甚至路人依然养猫，外面依然有流浪猫，空气中其实一直漂浮着二手猫。
chunks.en: There are many solutions now. One is hypoallergenic cat food, two is allergy shots for people, and three is finding a way to coexist with asthma. Removing the cat isn't a magic bullet. Even if you remove the cat, colleagues and even strangers will still have cats. There are still stray cats outside, and 'secondhand cat' is always floating in the air.

chunks.zh: 猫过敏只是一个诱因，这次是猫，下次也许是花粉螨虫或者某种植物，或者就纯是冷空气，无论是否移除猫你都面临和哮喘共存。
chunks.en: Cat allergy is just one trigger. This time it's cats, next time it might be pollen, dust mites, or some kind of plant, or just cold air. Whether or not you remove the cat, you face living with asthma.

chunks.zh: 建议你先尝试下离开猫是不是能有立竿见影的效果，然后徐徐图之。
chunks.en: I suggest you first try to see if leaving the cat has an immediate effect, and then proceed slowly.

chunks.zh: 即便离开猫你有立竿见影的效果，也建议你进行脱敏，毕竟现在还年轻，现在是老婆养猫，还能讲讲道理，以后万一小孩想养猫怎么办。
chunks.en: Even if leaving the cat has an immediate effect, I suggest you get desensitized, after all you are still young. Now it is your wife who has a cat, so you can reason with her. What if your child wants to have a cat in the future?

chunks.zh: 猫过敏的人在动画片里都只能当反派好吗
chunks.en: People with cat allergies can only be villains in cartoons, okay?

chunks.zh: 你换个场景思考，宿舍里面，现在有一个人每天给你慢性投毒，你却因为对方长的顺眼，愿意接受。
chunks.en: Think of it this way, in a dormitory, someone is slowly poisoning you every day, but you are willing to accept it because you like their appearance.

chunks.zh: 哮喘又不死人，一辈子哮喘问题也不大
chunks.en: Asthma doesn't kill people, a lifetime of asthma isn't a big deal.

chunks.zh: 不想失去就忍呗，反正过敏哮喘的又不是网友🐶
chunks.en: If you don't want to lose it, then put up with it. Anyway, it's not the netizens who have allergies and asthma. 🐶

chunks.zh: 无孩爱猫女的刻板印象不断加深。
chunks.en: The stereotype of childless, cat-loving women is constantly reinforced.

chunks.zh: 换只无毛猫，或者你们分开住
chunks.en: Get a hairless cat, or live separately.

chunks.zh: 1.专门整个猫房/笼养
chunks.en: 1. Get a separate cat room / cage.

chunks.zh: 2.送人
chunks.en: 2. Give it away.

chunks.zh: 3.尊重自然选择, 你能脱敏就活下来, 不能脱敏就...🐶🐶🐶
chunks.en: 3. Respect natural selection. If you can become desensitized, you survive. If you can't, then...🐶🐶🐶

chunks.zh: 身体 100%自己的，老婆和猫可不一定
chunks.en: Your body is 100% your own, your wife and cat are not necessarily.

chunks.zh: 我原来在杭州也养猫，没啥事，后来回北京了，慢慢的开始对猫过敏了，现在和猫共处一室不一会就会狂打喷嚏、眼睛痒、喉咙肿，简直了太受罪了，也尝试戴口罩，不过没啥用。
chunks.en: I used to have cats in Hangzhou and it was fine, but later I went back to Beijing and slowly started to become allergic to cats. Now, being in the same room with a cat for a short time will cause me to sneeze violently, have itchy eyes, and a swollen throat. It's terrible. I've tried wearing a mask, but it's useless.

chunks.zh: 难受的时候去楼道通会风，好一点，正常情况需要在户外呆一个小时左右才能缓过来，眼睛消红。
chunks.en: When I feel uncomfortable, I go to the hallway to get some air, which helps a little. Normally, I need to stay outside for about an hour to recover and get rid of the red eyes.

chunks.zh: 上呼吸道肿也会有窒息的风险，老哥不行咱俩过吧
chunks.en: Swelling of the upper respiratory tract also has the risk of suffocation. If it doesn't work out, brother, let's get together.

chunks.zh: 猫不愿意送人其实很正常，问题是你老婆不愿意在乎你。
chunks.en: It's normal for the cat not to want to be given away, the problem is that your wife doesn't care about you.

chunks.zh: 若你老婆真的在乎你，就不会有愿不愿意这个问题。
chunks.en: If your wife really cared about you, the question of whether or not she's willing wouldn't even exist.

chunks.zh: 你目前的所有想法都是因为你爱她，你克制了一切，伤害自己。
chunks.en: All your current thoughts are because you love her. You are restraining everything and hurting yourself.

chunks.zh: 你若真的爱你老婆，更应该教导她明事理，告诉她这个猫不仅仅伤害了身体，也伤害了你俩的感情，更扭曲了情侣共同维护的价值观。
chunks.en: If you really love your wife, you should teach her to be reasonable and tell her that this cat is not only harming your body, but also harming your relationship and distorting the values that you both uphold as a couple.

chunks.zh: @aisles1 #14 就是，就哮喘而已哪有猫重要；就算哮喘死了，反正人迟早是要死的。🐶
chunks.en: @aisles1 #14 Exactly, just asthma, how is it more important than a cat; even if asthma kills you, people are going to die sooner or later anyway. 🐶

chunks.zh: @lengmou 诡计多端的 0000000
chunks.en: @lengmou A scheming 0000000

chunks.zh: 哪怕是两个宠物, 互相之间有冲突也要分开吧.
chunks.en: Even if they are just two pets, if they conflict with each other, you should separate them.

chunks.zh: 你地位＜宠物.
chunks.en: Your status < pet

chunks.zh: 送回老家让父母养
chunks.en: Send it back to your hometown for your parents to raise.

chunks.zh: 有方案之前给猫穿个衣服，3 天一换，会少不少毛
chunks.en: Before you have a solution, put clothes on the cat and change them every 3 days. It will reduce a lot of hair.
